summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2085, for the improvement of Twentieth Avenue Northwest, in the City of Seattle, from Shilshole Avenue to Ballard Avenue, by planking the same and by constructing wooden walks, curbs and gutters, under Ordinance No. 21179, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
